QuadEq Functions

Functions to solve quadratic equations

class quadeq.QuadraticEquation(a, b, c)

A quadratic equation of the form a*x*x + b*x + c = 0

Parameters

  • a (float) – non-zero coefficient of x**2

  • b (float) – coefficient of x

  • c (float) – constant

discriminant()

Computes the discriminant b**2 - 4*a*c of a quadratic equation

find_x()

Solves the quadratic equation

Returns

first solution (-b-sqrt(delta))/(2a)

x2 (float): second solution (-b+sqrt(delta))/(2a)

Return type

x1 (float)
